protein.specific_function: Reduces hydrogen peroxide and alkyl hydroperoxides with reducing equivalents provided through the thioredoxin system. Involved in intracellular redox signaling.

go_class.description: cysteine-type endopeptidase inhibitor activity involved in apoptotic process
RNA polymerase III regulatory region DNA binding
cellular response to reactive oxygen species
negative regulation of transcription from RNA polymerase III promoter
positive regulation of collagen biosynthetic process
regulation of apoptosis involved in tissue homeostasis
